patthana16.50:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.50:1.1_1: nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
patthana16.50:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.50:2.1_1: nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
